      class  MorcBuilder<Builder extends MorcBuilder<Builder>>
      The root builder for specifying processors and predicates for message publishers and mock definitions

    • Uses of MorcBuilder in nz.ac.auckland.morc.mock

    • Uses of MorcBuilder in nz.ac.auckland.morc.mock.builder

      Subclasses of MorcBuilder in nz.ac.auckland.morc.mock.builder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AsyncMockDefinitionBuilder
      Generates an mock definition for ensuring asynchronous messages will be received at some point in the future.
      class  ContentMockDefinitionBuilder
      A concrete implementation of ContentMockDefinitionBuilderInit
      class  ContentMockDefinitionBuilderInit<Builder extends ContentMockDefinitionBuilderInit<Builder>>
      A builder to generate a mock definition that validates the bodies and headers for an incoming message
      class  ExceptionMockDefinitionBuilder
      This builder will add a repeated processor that sets an exception response to calls - this is likely to cause transaction rollback or some kind of SOAP fault

      If no exception is specified then an empty Exception is thrown
      class  HttpErrorMockDefinitionBuilder
      This will cause a Jetty or CXF endpoint (message consumer) to throw an HTTP 500 (or other) error with the specified body - this could be a SOAP fault message in the case of a web-service

      It is recommended to use SoapFaultMockDefinitionBuilder if you want to throw correct CXF SOAP Faults
      class  SoapFaultMockDefinitionBuilder
      This will cause a CXF endpoint (message consumer) to return a specified SOAP fault back to the consumer
      class  SyncMockDefinitionBuilder
      A concrete implementation of SyncMockDefinitionBuilderInit
      class  SyncMockDefinitionBuilderInit<Builder extends SyncMockDefinitionBuilderInit<Builder,T>,T extends TestResource>
      A builder that generates a mock definition that will set the body or headers for a message response
      class  UnreceivedMockDefinitionBuilder
      A builder to generate a mock definition that ensures no message is expected to be received at this point.

      Subclasses of MorcBuilder in nz.ac.auckland.morc.specification 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AsyncOrchestratedTestBuilder
      A builder that generates a complete test specification including all expectations for asynchronously sending a message to a target destination.
      static class  OrchestratedTestSpecification.OrchestratedTestSpecificationBuilder

      class  SyncOrchestratedTestBuilder
      A builder that generates a synchronous orchestrated test specification that will call a target endpoint that provides a response(s).
